text: Backlash (2001) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on April 29, 2001 at the Allstate Arena in Rosemont, Illinois. It was the third Backlash event held by the WWF. ==Matches== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Backlash 2001 website Category:2001 in professional wrestling Category:WWE Backlash Category:2001 in American television Category:2000s in Illinois
title: Backlash (2001)
